verses.verse: At that time <WH6256> Merodachbaladan <WH4757>, the son <WH1121> of Baladan <WH1081>, king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, sent <WH7971> <WH8804> letters <WH5612> and a present <WH4503> to Hizkiyah-yahu <WH2396>: for he had heard <WH8085> <WH8799> that he had been sick <WH2470> <WH8804>, and was recovered <WH2388> <WH8799>.
